content: ***** ***** kits are available for this shawl here 1 the pattern is available off ravelry here 2 if preferred just like its namesake wisdom of the moon is an intriguing combination of subtle and bold the beautiful moon colorwork grabs attention immediately but then the eye is drawn to all the subtle details from the tiny stars to the slipped-stitch chevron pattern and those details ensure that the knitting stays interesting from cast on to i-cord bind off if you haven t done one of those before you ll be delighted to find they re actually quite easy this shawl is knit from the top down and all instructions are written out except for the moon colorwork which is charted the moon colorwork is also the only stranded knitting in the pattern - in the rest of the shawl only 1 color is used at a time **materials** aurora dk by wull studios 3 40% superfine alpaca 40% merino wool 20% silk 252 yds 230 m / 3 5 oz 100 g 2 skeins in waning crescent color a 1 skein in wisdom color b 1 skein in august moon color c us #5 3 75 mm circular needles or size to obtain gauge **gauge** 21 stitches = 4 inches 10 cm in stockinette st gauge is not crucial to pattern but will affect yardage requirements and finished size at the given gauge the shawl uses virtually all 504 yds of color a and you may need additional yarn if your gauge is looser **finished size** 60 inches 152 cm from tip to tip by 28 inches 71 cm from center top to lower edge relaxed after blocking 1 https //wullstudios com/collections/kits/products/wisdom-of-the-moon-shawl-kits 2 https //wullstudios com/collections/patterns/products/wisdom-of-the-moon-shawl-pattern 3 https //wullstudios com/products/aurora-dk
